title: How did Devanagari script come into existence? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, after going through various theories, the vattezhuTTu must have been in force, when Dravidians alone were there throughout India. Sanskrit also belonged to Dravidians, contrary to the belief that it belonged to a ‘different’ race. Remember, Dravidians were spread all over from the Persian border in the Northwest to AndamAns tip in the South East. Later on when grammar specialists came, the script must have undergone changes. RAmAnujAchArya was of the firm view that both Tamizh and Sanskrit were co existing from time immemorial and that’s why he says the SanATanaDharmis are “UbhayavEDAnTis”, meaning Owners of ‘twin vEDaAnTa’.
